# any of several [[wine]]s (mostly red) from the valley of the [[Rhône]]
types.html:
luberon m (plural luberons)

  1. any of several wines (mostly red) from the valley of the Rhône
trans: any of several wines  from the valley of the Rhône
any of several wines  from the valley of the Rhône

title: luberon
